item.title: Zach LaVine Throws Down the 360 Slam!
item.description:
Zach LaVine Throws Down the 360 Slam!

Zach LaVine gets out on the break and makes the 360 jam look easy. About the NBA: The NBA is the premier professional basketball league in the United States and Canada. The league is truly global, with games and programming in 215 countries and territories in 47 languages, as well as NBA rosters at the start of the 2015-16 season featuring 100 international players from 37 countries and territories.

item.title: Aaron Gordon Powers Home the Windmill Jam!
item.description:
Aaron Gordon Powers Home the Windmill Jam!

Aaron Gordon takes the feed from Victor Oladipo and powers home a monster windmill jam. About the NBA: The NBA is the premier professional basketball league in the United States and Canada.

item.title: E a disputa continua na NBA!!
item.description:
E a disputa continua na NBA!!

Em uma semana de quebra de recordes do GSW incluindo sequencia de vitórias jogando em casa, sequencia de bolas de 3 do armador Stephen Curry e a sexta derrota do time da California, outros times da Liga continuam a glamurar as quadras. Na segunda feira foi a vez de Zach Lavine,
